Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Tr: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Training & Development The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Training & Development prepares students for entry-level positions as training and development specialists. Students will develop sensitivity to the needs of diverse audiences of learners, ability to apply best practices in organizational communication, competency to evaluate training and development programs, and capability to design effective organizational interventions.
